mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RNO, RTITLE, RCONTENT, RPOINT, RPOTO, RDEPTH, REPORTCOUNT, RWRITER_DATE, RAPPOINTMENT, CNO, DSAUP_NO) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, 0, 0, SYSDATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPOINTMENT WHERE CNO=#{param5} AND DSAUP_NO=#{param6}), #{param5}, #{param6})
